body.name: AIDEA-Brite Non-Scratch Scrub Sponge-24Count, Sponges for Dishes, Cleaning Sponge, Cleans Fast Without Scratching, Stands Up to Stuck-on Grime, Cleaning Power for Everyday Jobs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 47 mins
features: 【Superior Cleaning Power】--AIDEA non-scratch cleaning sponge effortlessly cuts through messes while protecting your surfaces. The sturdy abrasive scour pads effectively remove stuck-on food. The high-density sponge with excellent rebound resilience is hard to deform.

【Dishwasher-Safe Sanitization】--AIDEA Non-scratch sponges are crafted from environmentally friendly materials. After each use, simply rinse them with water, and they will quickly dry without developing unpleasant odors. For long-lasting use, you can also sanitize them in your dishwasher.

【Built to Last】--These cleaning sponges feature a scouring pad on one side and an absorbent sponge on the other, allowing for multiple uses. They are remarkably durable and resistant to tearing and wear, even after numerous applications, making them ideal for tackling tough burned food stains.

【Versatile Cleaning Solution】--Effortlessly clean your dishes, pots, pans, sinks, stoves, appliances, bathroom, garage, and kitchen with ease and efficiency. These sponges ensure your kitchen and household appliances remain shiny and tidy after every use, providing optimal cleaning performance.
【Your Satisfaction is Our Priority】--If our sponges do not meet your expectations, please contact us via email, and we will promptly provide the best solution for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Strong Decontamination High-density sponge foams easily with a little detergent and good rebound resilience, hard to deform. Sturdy abrasive scour pads scrub off stuck-on food, Remove hard dirt easier. Efficient and Durable Durable materials stand up to stuck-on grime and not easy to tear and wear out even after numerous uses. Also sanitize in your dishwasher for lasting use. Multi-purpose Cleaning Easy to clean your dishes, pots, pans, sinks, stoves. Keep your kitchen and household appliances shiny and neat after every use. The ‘S’ shape design is ergonomic for a better grip and fits your hand comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AIDEA-Brite Non-Scratch Scrub Sponge-24Count, Sponges for Dishes
reviews.reviewText: At first I was shocked when these sponges came in the mail - that they only had one half the normal sponge on top, but after using one I realized I didn't need all that extra sponge at all or the excess soaping power of a large topped sponge. I got a super price break on this 24 count non scratch blue scrub sponge pack by AIDEA-Brite. I actually like them alot better and they are easier to use on my dishes and pots and pans than your normal non scratch sponges and are of better quality. They take up less room to store in storage cabinet and on the sink backsplash area when using one. Huge part, I saved tons of money over all the overpriced and expensive name brands and their overrated knockoffs. Not sure why but over the last few years but the name brand sponges & knockoffs don't last long because their non-scratch bottoms don't hold up. These AIDEA-Brite sponges already proving they last a lot longer and cost a whole lot less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look pretty and work well
reviews.reviewText: Quite frankly I chose these because I hate how most sponges look. Their bright, borderline neon colors can look garrish against neutral or soft tones. These sponges look cute and discreet. They're surprisingly thin, but they work really well and they dry quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly fine kitchen sponge
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the pictured sponge for cleaning dishes, pots and pans for just over 2 weeks now. It does not smell bad at all and is holding together well IMO. I expect I'll get another week out of it. As others have said, it is a little on the thin side, but I don't think it's too thin and it's very comfortable for me to use. Gets into the edges easier than some of the thicker sponges I've had. It does not scratch my non-stick. I would definitely purchase these again. They came quickly and the price was very reasonable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price!
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely worth it for how many you get for the price. They are initially the same as the name brand. Work great. They don't last quite as long as named brand but that's ok because you get so many in the package . Recommend. I will buy these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: These are much smaller than expected. I was looking for something similar but cheaper than the other big brand name Scrub Sponge. These were disappointing. They do the job, but they are much smaller and thinner than expected.They also had some oil or manufacturing grease out of the package that needed to be washed off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little sponges.....
reviews.reviewText: At first the sponges looked very flimsy...thought they will only last a few uses......but not so.......I find they are quite tough, swell up to about 1/2"....the scrubber is decent and I think one of these will ladt me about 3 wks before I toss it....not bad...6 was 4.99...(ordered again but have gone up....wdnt you know it)...I ordered 12 more for 7.99. I like them...think they are good value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cleanup tools for the breakroom
reviews.reviewText: We go through a lot of paper towels and having these sponges around saves us money. These are terrific with the rough scrubby side to clean counters and the softer side to wash glasses. They wear well and last longer than most. The price was super economical.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are slightly smaller than a normal sponge, but they work so well that size doesn’t even matter. The sponge is very absorbent and durable, also cleans great
I like those sponges, good value for money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works the way you want it to
reviews.reviewText: Does just what I wanted it to. I even throw it in the wash (but NOT the dryer) and let it dry naturally. Doesn't come out as pretty but still works great.
These are strong sponges. I use them for everything. From dishes to general clean up. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: work well but look thicker in the advert
reviews.reviewText: High absorbency unlike ordinary foam sponge, good for taps and the like no scratching

These are good in their own way. If you expect everything like 3M or other name brands, they are close, but not exactly.If you're used to 3M, these Aidea are smaller and slightly thinner. If you want to stick it into smaller openings, these are great. For dishes and other things, these are good, but I can see the bigger size of 3M slightly better.This Aidea is also softer out of the box. It's much easier to wash smaller glasses with it than 3M. Though 3M will soften over time.For the price. This is very good.
